#summary Appengine Admin features.
#labels Featured

= Implemented features =
  * List records for each registered model
  * Create new records
  * Update/edit records
  * Delete records
  * Supported and tested model property types:
    * StringProperty
    * IntegerProperty
    * FloatProperty
    * DateTimeProperty
    * DateProperty
    * TimeProperty
    * ReferenceProperty
    * TextProperty
  * These property types have custom widgets:
    * Any property with `choices`: dropdown list
    * !TextProperty - Textarea
    * !ReferenceProperty - dropdown list of existing records
